markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Runic Impression](/Spells.aspx?ID=1040)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** you or one weapon you're wielding
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose when you cast this spell: [_corrosive_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292), [_flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295), [_frost_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), [_returning_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301), [_shock_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303), or [_thundering_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306). If you cast _runic impression_ on a weapon, this spell ends if you cease holding the weapon.

 If this spell would give a weapon more property runes than its normal maximum, one of the existing property runes (you choose) is suppressed until the spell ends. For [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks, if this spell would give you more property runes than you could have from [_handwraps of mighty blows_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441), one of the existing property runes is similarly suppressed.

---
**Heightened (8th)** Add [_keen_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=300) to the list of runes you can choose as well as the greater types of _corrosive_, _flaming_, _frost_, _shock_, and _thundering_.
name: Runic Impression

text: Runic Impression Source Secrets of Magic pg. 143 1.1 Cast Single Action somatic Range touch Target you or one weapon you're wielding Duration 1 minute --- Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose when you cast this spell: corrosive , flaming , frost , ghost touch , returning , shock , or thundering . If you cast runic impression on a weapon, this spell ends if you cease holding the weapon. If this spell would give a weapon more property runes than its normal maximum, one of the existing property runes (you choose) is suppressed until the spell ends. For unarmed attacks, if this spell would give you more property runes than you could have from handwraps of mighty blows , one of the existing property runes is similarly suppressed. --- Heightened (8th) Add keen to the list of runes you can choose as well as the greater types of corrosive , flaming , frost , shock , and thundering .
